plot outline: For the college holidays, five friends return to their native village where the love between a boy and a girl is still forbidden. They decide to change the villagers' backward mentality by wooing the village girls. The village chairman had an affair with the street dancer Kavitha (Risha) in the past and when he became a chairman, he ditched her out. The five friends help many couples to get married despite the interference of the villagers. The film ends with the villagers changing their backward mentality.
